description:
The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet is a world fusion project led by acclaimed
guitarist, composer, and educator Ravi Iyer. Blending Hindustani and Carnatic
classical with rock and jazz, his original compositions feature intricate
melodies and rhythmic patterns that engage and inspire.
name: Windmills Music Night - The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet

performer.description: The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet is a world fusion project led by acclaimed guitarist, composer, and educator Ravi Iyer. Blending Hindustani and Carnatic classical with rock and jazz, his original compositions feature intricate melodies and rhythmic patterns that engage and inspire.
performer.name: The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet
performer.url: Todi Jaldi | The Ravi Iyer Fusion Quartet
